Articles.Content:
Due to the latest confusion/mess ups over the grading scheme/curve for Organic chemistry, I have no freaking idea of what my grade is/will be.

I was expecting an F (or D by marginal points), but the latest upset could put me in the C/C+ range. Quite frankly I have no idea, and don\'t even know when I\'ll find my final grade.

Person with the closest guess without going over wins all the shame and humiliation of my worst final grade out of anything I have ever taken before.

Now please excuse me while I cry myself to sleep.

Ydoow: My sympathies.

If at any stage you need help, I\'d be more than willing to assist if possible (PM).

Isn\'t that a good thing? C/C+ isn\'t too bad is it? (Excuse me if I\'m wrong, I assume you\'re American and we may have a very different system here. England.)

Anyway, Optimism is best: A (Assuming that is the second best thing)

Isn\'t that a good thing? C/C+ isn\'t too bad is it? (Excuse me if I\'m wrong, I assume you\'re American and we may have a very different system here. England.)

Anyway, Optimism is best: A (Assuming that is the second best thing)

Welp. I was going for Biotechnology, and that requires a B minimum, but I switched out to something else a while ago.

A C/C+ isn\'t bad (I\'m not very used to that kinda grade though).

The course is out of 1040 points (40 are bonus points)

I think my total score is about 536 :l

I\'m not exactly sure how I rank compared to everyone else is a part of my problem, but I do know I flat out bombed my last two tests.

The first two I did pretty good on though, but it\'s the overall score vs. the class that matters

Ydoow, you have my sincerest sympathies. I haven\'t taken O-Chem (and don\'t thank god for being an Aero ), but my friends who have have stated that it is possible to get 20s on tests and still get an A. They described it as painful in ways that I don\'t think can actually be stated here (the forum is family-friendly right?).

I\'m gonna bet D for one reason:

D\'s get degrees.

WOO BABY!

C- FO SHOW!

Literally about 2 letter grades higher than I was expecting ^-^

Aw, there there.

I got an X in German and ICT.

Everything else is B except History which is D.
